title: One game vs Plats the next i have Silvers/Golds????????????
body: Just played a rank game I'm currently Platinum 4 and i got matched with Silver 1 - Gold 3's but the game before that i won and was vsing Platinum 5 - Platinum 3's how and why did i just get matched with people not near my skill level and don't give me the "Your mmr is sht" or "You're boosted" cause no I'm not and I'm pretty sure my mmr isn't trash i just want to know if they just have a high mmr or its just something wrong in the system???

replies.body:
Basically here is what happened.

Olaf (Plat 5) and Tristana (Gold 5) were premade together, so the game needs a plat 5, and the game's MMR also ends up being around the Mid gold high silver range, due to that fact, and the fact that dynamic queue sucks at doing proper match making.
well considering u have a 48% win rate, your mmr will be lower

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7nu3bksZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-15T12:29:29.578+0000)
>
> well considering u have a 48% win rate, your mmr will be lower

Yes and No, Not that low but yeah i would say i have a low win rate but so what I'm in platinum played another game got again all platinum so it could possibly be a wrong placement???

But I'm not complaining as they say "Freelo"

>
> Yes and No, Not that low but yeah i would say i have a low win rate but so what I'm in platinum played another game got again all platinum so it could possibly be a wrong placement???
> 
> But I'm not complaining as they say "Freelo"

Your recent games and current game is plat 5/gold 1 mmr. The system is working fine you just have slightly lower mmr
